transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello. Hello, good evening sir. Sir, maine mail kar diya hai, aap check kar lijiyega sir. Thik hai?
Customer: Sir ye to ye normal ID se kiya na aapne?
Executive: Sir meri IndiaMART ki ID hai, check kijiye sir.
Customer: IndiaMART ki ID hai.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Sir ye thik hai, aapke liye 24 ghante ke liye intzaar karenge na?
Customer: Aap isko karwao.
Executive: 24 hours.
Customer: Sir ho jayega sir aapka.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hume kya hai na, hume.
Executive: 4 hours ka time dijiye sir, ho jayega.
Customer: Thik hai, ye madam to abhi bol ke gaye the ki hum log karwa denge sham tak aur kya aisa kyu hua?
Executive: Sir wo na thoda matlab isme verification hota hai sir, 24 hours lag jata hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai, verification madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir, matlab 24 hours tak ka wait kar lijiye aapka ho jayega sir.
Executive: Wo thoda.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Sir 24 hours me aapka ho jayega sir.
Executive: 24 hours to wait kar lijiye.
Customer: Verification kya karna hai madam aapko. Chaliye thik hai.
Executive: Sir ek.
Customer: Okay sir, okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks why work not done by evening.

- Customer asks about verification process.



Resolution:

- Executive says verification takes 24 hours.

- Executive asks customer to wait 24 hours.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- verification, mail, id
